message.body: Holy shit the roads are bad and this guy is flying.
Oh man. Be safe.
I will. Thanks for taking me along on the awesome Slamdance ride. I am very grateful.
Hah!
You too. Get home safe.
i made some grunting noises I think he got the picture
Me too. Proud to have been a part of it. Lemme know what I can do to help with your script for June.
Of course!!! Thank you for taking time to come and support this little movie! And for all you did on it. I am so glad you were there!
Thanks! I'll definitely be needing some help. Give Alethia and the pups a snuggle from me!
I will. Let's get a date on the books for you guys to come over for a vegetarian feast.
My bag came. Now gotta pray septa will get me home.
Sweet!! Can't wait! I'm crossing my fingers for you!
I'll get Alethia to make hummus.
I'm on my 2nd train; just a few stops from home.
I'm glad you made it! I passed out Immediately
I slept for a long time as well. So tired. Enjoy being home.
You too!
I am. Butters just keeps staring at me lovingly.

Really rooting for your film to win the short narrative category; please let me know if you hear anything. If it doesn't happen, it is an incredible accomplishment to be an official selection at Slamdance, and will hopefully be a springboard for many more audiences to see your film.
Of course. Any time. I've always got your back.
Thanks Dan!! Means a lot. I will let you know if I hear anything. Thanks again for coming with me!
ï¿¼George singing.
Is this real!!!? Ahahaha. He's in tune and everything! Sending to my mother immediately.
He is amazing. I need to figure out how to auto tune him to different songs.
